name: Yuxuan Tian
bio: Hey guys! I am the lead organizer of the MEGA Hack 2022. Can't wait to see all the great projects that will help achieve the UN 17 goals.

name: Noah Trupin
bio: I'm Noah, a highschool student with a passion for programming and talking about programming. I lead MEGAHack's tech team.

name: Jamie Nicholson
bio: Hi! I'm Jamie Nicholson, and I'm a senior at the Lawrenceville School. I am currently the president of our Programming Club, and am so excited to help organize this Hackathon!

name: Agni Rajinikanth
bio: Hi, I'm the Co-Founder and lead organizer at the Mega Hackthon League. I am looking forward to our first hackathon event and seeing all our projects.

name: Jianglu Ping
bio: I'm a junior at Northfield Mount Hermon School, and I'm excited about using my social entrepreneurship skills to help organize NJ MEGA Hack 2022.

name: Tianxiang Wei
bio: Hi, I am a high school student in Canada and aim to connect students in Canada with the exciting MEGA Hackathon events!

name: Junyi Wang
bio: I'm Junyi and in charge of designing the posters.

name: Urmi Sumant
bio: Hello! My name is Urmi Sumant and I'm a high school student in California. I'm really excited to utilize my financial and entrepreneurial skillset to organize MEGA Hack 2022!

name: Sunny Park
bio: Hi, I am Sunny Park, a senior from the Hun School of Princeton, leading computer science club. I am excited to help organize MEGA Hackathon with my passion in computer science!

name: Promit Mukhopadhyay
bio: I animate posters and other designs created by our artists.

name: Ishan Parikh
bio: Hello, I am ishan and I help with the marketing and graphic designs for Mega Hack 2022!

name: Adit Trivedi
bio: I make email templates that the heads check over before sending the email to other ngos and partners.

name: Skywalker Li
bio: Hi! I'm Skywalker Li, and I'm a student at Newark Academy. Excited to get to know you all!

name: Max Xiong
bio: Hey! I'm Max and I help lead Graphics Design and am a part of the Marketing team. Looking forward to working with everyone!

name: Jason Xu
bio: Hi, I'm Jason and I am so excited to help Daniel and Agni organize this hackathon! Best of luck to those participating.

name: Ian Song
bio: Hi, I'm Ian Song a Junior at Dwight School Seoul, and I'm excited to cohost MEGA Hack 2022 from South Korea!

name: Chul Lee
bio: Hi I’m Chul! I’m part of the finance team and am so excited to work with everyone! Good luck to those participating!

name: Daniel Achacon
bio: Hi, I am Daniel Achacon and I am a sophomore at Rutgers Preparatory School. I look forward to working with you all and best of luck to all who participate!
